chronic_insight_iv.name: Chronic Insight IV
chronic_insight_iv.description: Reduces the scaling of exp required by 1% (Additively) per each level. Stacks with Chronic Insights

echoes_of_time_iii.name: Echoes of Time III
echoes_of_time_iii.description:
Hear echoes from yourselves in different time. Bosses defeated will reduce their future danger by the number of times you have defeated the boss. The danger reduction will persist through rebirths and regressions. 

 New Boss Danger = Boss Danger - (boss lifetime defeat amount * (0.1 x total echoes of time levels))

idle_reincarnator.name: Idle Reincarnator
idle_reincarnator.description:
Even after all the multiple lives, you're still you. 

Rebirth and Regression can be automated.
